```{r setup}
options(wfdb_path = "/usr/local/bin")
library(egm)
```

How do you read in a *.dat* file from WFDB?

```{r}
# This is hte XML file
# Can read it in from MUSE easily
xml <- 
  system.file('extdata', 'muse-sinus.xml', package = 'egm') |>
  read_muse()

class(xml)
xml

```
